org.javact.lang
Interface BecomeCtI

All Superinterfaces:
JavActComponentInt, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BecomeCt
public interface BecomeCtI
extends JavActComponentInt

*META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* Specification of a Become component. Implemented by BecomeCt. Implementable by a user meta-component-level class.

Version:
0.4.0
